import React from "react" import IconBadge from './IconBadge.js'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; // Import the Link component import pictureOfMe from './images/about_me_photo.png'; import './App.css'; function About(props) { return (

About Me

Hi, my name is William Vennard

I'm currently a Web Developer at GradientOne, where I have worked for the past 5 years. I specialize in UX/UI design and implementation and enjoy doing data visualization and animations. I current live and work remotely in Lake Tahoe California, where I enjoy to ski in the winter and rock climb in the summer.

Click here to view my resume.

) } export default About;
